name: Smart Spending l Snoop Finance [CPA, Android] UK
description:
Join the new offer Smart Spending l Snoop Finance [CPA, Android] UK!   

From anywhere, at any time, on one app, you’ll have access to the discounts you love provided exclusively by your employer, including the weekly promotions when your discounts get even bigger. You can use the app to purchase Instant Vouchers and save them to a digital wallet for future use, earn Cashback when shopping online with your phone, and use Cashback towards Instant Voucher purchases to make your savings go even further! But there are heaps more features you’ll love:


	Huge choice
	Online shopping
	Intelligent basket
	Safe & secure
	Your account


Allowed traffic sources:


	Mobile web
	Inapp Traffic
	Goodle ads UAC


Prohibited traffic sources:


	Social media (FB, Instagram, Tiktok)
	Youtube
	Snapchat
	Incentive traffic

NOTES:
1. Name campaigns like this Agency_AppName_OS_Geo
2. Avoid exceeded dimensions (don't use to many values of media_sources and other parameters), the details are there:

Also important, please always add to your links: utm_source=affiliate

Hard KPI:


	installs - 5000 per source
	fraud - not more than 20%
	retention rates - client will just look at the % of users who get back to the product after some periods from corresponding installs.
	refund rates - refunds/subscriptions, no more than 12%
	chargbacks rates - refunds/subscriptions, no more than 3%

name: Italki [CPA, iOS + Android] WW
description:
Join a new affiliate program Italki [CPA, iOS + Android] WW

Italki is a language learning platform that connects users with native-speaking tutors for personalized, flexible online lessons. It offers a wide range of languages and tailored teaching to help learners improve their skills effectively.
